text: Barbro Christina Hedvall, (born February 8, 1944 in Bromma) is a Swedish journalist. She was an editorial writer for Dagens Nyheter between 1999 until 2009, and before that she was an editorial writer for Expressen for nineteen years. Hedvall is frequently a guest at the SVT morning show and along with Göran Greider she has written a book called Stil och politik about political fashion. ==Bibliography== *1975 – Kvinnan i politiken, *2011 – Vår rättmätiga plats: om kvinnornas kamp för rösträtt , ==References== Category:Living people Category:1944 births Category:Swedish journalists Category:People from Stockholm
title: Barbro Hedvall
